title: Portrait of Charles I (1600-1649)
medium: watercolor on cut paper; tortoise shell mounted wood frame
provenance_text:
Harry Oatway [-1917?], London, England, until sometime before November 1917 [1]; Estate of Harry Oatway, by November 1917; (sold at American Art Association, New York, NY, November 7, 1917); purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, November 7, 1917; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] Oatway must have died prior to November of 1917, when his collection went up for auction at the American Art Association as the collection of the "late Mr. Harry Oatway."
